name: places/ChIJb58ryqxZwokRCdCCCfGCEjQ
formattedAddress: 427 E 82nd St, New York, NY 10028, USA
adrFormatAddress: 427 E 82nd St, New York, NY 10028-6090, USA

originalText.text: Stayed here while I was traveling and working. Nice experience over all. There were some minor issues including a clogged bathtub and a drawer that wouldn't fully open, but otherwise a nice place. Some staff came in to take care of any issues. The location is great being in a relatively safe area and so close to a lot of restaurants (with a great pizza place, La Mia pizza nearby). There is also a washing machine and dryer within the same building.

text.text: Stayed here while I was traveling and working. Nice experience over all. There were some minor issues including a clogged bathtub and a drawer that wouldn't fully open, but otherwise a nice place. Some staff came in to take care of any issues. The location is great being in a relatively safe area and so close to a lot of restaurants (with a great pizza place, La Mia pizza nearby). There is also a washing machine and dryer within the same building.

originalText.text:
We do not recommend Furnished Quarters -
The apartment is terrible:

The kitchen:
It’s too small and uncomfortable, There is not sufficient storage space for groceries !

The kitchen has only one drawer that does not open, we cannot access the silverware!
The oven buttons stick out and interfere with the drawer opening and that cancels the drawer access (unbelievable !!!!!!).

There is not enough space for the garbage which make in unbearable!
The oven and gas are old and does not work properly. The gas flame is too strong or too weak – hard to use !
When I have tried to use the oven - the smoke detector started immediately to beep and I could not use it ! (Dinner was ruined)
They have referred to us the supper - The supper has deactivated the smoke detector and I am not ready to use the oven and take risk of not being alerted in the event of a fire !
Since than we do not use the oven !

The windows and shades:
The shades breaks all the time and the light bother us to sleep !
The windows are old and do not open properly – only partly

The Elevator:
The door get Stuck all the time.
The door does not open and it really makes it difficult to function on the 6th floor.
We had to use the stairs more than once!

Closet space:
There is not enough storage cabinets in the apartment and we have no room for clothes.
It makes the unit very uncomfortable to live in.
There are not enough storage cabinets in the baths.
In the gest bath the door does not open fully only partly and it gets stuck in the toilet.

Air Conditioning:
The small room does not have air conditioning.
The supper enter the apartment when we were absent - we were amazed to discover that he installed an portable Unit that greatly reduces the space of the room and that makes it difficult to function!
In the rest of the apartment A.C is noisy and dusty (has bad odor) – we cannot use it (the weather is getting hot) .

The Lobby:
The mail is scattered on the floor -Our personal letters are accessible for anyone who enters the building!
As I have mentioned before - There is a strong garbage smelly odor in the main entrance all the time !
